name: Topsy Turvy
description: Topsy Turvy is a popular succulent known for its unique, wavy leaves that curl outward, giving the plant a fun and eye-catching look. The leaves are bluish-green in colour with a soft, powdery coating, and the plant grows in a neat rosette shape. With good sunlight, the leaf edges may develop a light pink shade. Topsy Turvy grows well in well-draining soil and is ideal for pots, balconies, and indoor succulent collections.
